Khonkolor::

Khonkolor moved quickly and avoided the attack. He shot 25 times 
agaisnt RazorClaw.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen flaps his wings flying over the first shot then doging 
the 
> next two by weaving left and right. He let his wings go limp 
causing 
> him to drop to dodge the last shot but it was to late and he was 
> nailed directly in the chest knocking him 30 m back through the air 
> spinning rapidly until regaining his balance and flying up higher 
> into the sky. His tail whipped up above his head and fired of two 
> highly explosive rockets down toward RazorClaw while simultaneosly 
> firing four missiles from his wings trained on the rockets and at 
the 
> right angle to nail the rockets to explode just as they reach near 
> RazorClaws position.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Razorclaw::
> > 
> > Razorclaw dives to the right, feather missiles and machine gun 
fire 
> > pelting around and into him. He quickly raises raises his arms 
> > pointing one at Khonkolor and one at Halucigen, then fires four 
> > concussion blasts at each, though concentrating more on 
> > Halucigen.
